title: Toriton
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of conveyor belt sushi restaurants. This one offers many choices that are vegan suitable. Order vegan inari, maki and other vegetable rolls. Pay per plate. Chefs can also make special maki rolls when asked. Directions: take the Makomanai subway line to Minami Hiragishi station, and the restaurant is straight forward 15 minutes from the station.
